Package ooga.model.initialization.pieces

Class PieceCreator

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.initialization.Creator
ooga.model.initialization.pieces.PieceCreator
public class PieceCreator
extends Creator
This class is used to coordinate the creation of pieces, starting from parsing through the XML file and then going on to use reflection to compose the pieces

  • Constructor Details

    • PieceCreator

      public PieceCreator​(java.lang.String gameType, FrontEndExternalAPI viewController, GameBoard gameBoard)
      Initializes this piece creator which will be used to make pieces for the given game
      Parameters:
      gameType - The type of game that will be played

  • Method Details

    • makePiece

      public GamePiece makePiece​(java.lang.String pieceName, Coordinate coordinates, int direction, FrontEndExternalAPI viewController, java.lang.String team)
      Makes a GamePiece object
      Parameters:
      pieceName - The name of the piece (corresponds to the name of a file)
      coordinates - The coordinates that the piece is at
      direction - The direction that the piece can move, relative to the data file information
      viewController - The view controller, used to pass movement information to the front end
      Returns:
      The GamePiece that has been instantiated.
